poldis 0.0.3
  • Reference
  • News

Reference

Functions

The following functions are contained in poldis:

load_pdf()

Load text from PDFs

split_text()

Split texts

annotate_text()

Parse text with NLP

extract_context()

Extract context for string matches

extract_date()

Extract dates from text

extract_location()

Extract location from strings

extract_match()

Extract text matches

extract_promises()

Extract future promises from political discourses

extract_related_terms()

Extract terms related to subjects

extract_similarities()

Extract similarities and differences in texts/segments

extract_speaker()

Extract a list of the speakers in texts

extract_subjects()

Extract most frequent subjects from political discourses

extract_title()

Extract first sentence from text

get_urgency()

Urgency Analysis

get_urgency_rank()

Rank urgent topics

Data

The package contains some cleaned text corpuses for analysis.

US_News_Conferences_1960_1980

US News Conferences Data from 1960 to 1980

Contents
